data.name: Tanks2.DE
data.detailed_description:
The game is focused on fast topdown PvP action, giving you many opportunities to play against your opponents:

- Different tank types and playstyles (Light, Medium, Heavy, Tank Destroyer, Anti Air)
- Different ammo types and damage effects (AP, HE, HEAT, APDS, APDS-FS)
- Different map settings and destructible covers
- Shockwaves from big guns for supportive area damage
data.about_the_game:
The game is focused on fast topdown PvP action, giving you many opportunities to play against your opponents:

- Different tank types and playstyles (Light, Medium, Heavy, Tank Destroyer, Anti Air)
- Different ammo types and damage effects (AP, HE, HEAT, APDS, APDS-FS)
- Different map settings and destructible covers
- Shockwaves from big guns for supportive area damage
data.short_description: Tanks2.DE is a 2D online multiplayer tank shooter, currently featuring 2 nations with over 30 tanks from the World War 2 era. The game is in a stable open beta state and receives continuous updates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 or DirectX 11 compatible equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680 or DirectX 11 compatible equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
